overview: There are few versatile legends in the gay porn industry that reach the caliber of Adam Killian, and because of that Lucas Entertainment has compiled some of the star's best scenes in The Adam Killian Collection. Revel in Adam's sculpted physique, fat eight-inch cock, and devilish smile as he performs with Diego Lauzen, Wagner Vittoria, Jessie Colter, Parker London, John Magnum, and Michael Lucas. It's all in The Adam Killian Collection!
title: The Adam Killian Collection
